name: Mars Keeper (Virtual Nomad)
description:
Congratulations!

As a winner of the "You don't have to be Mega-Rich to go to Mars" contest, we do require that you earn your keep.

Of course, you will be provided all means to accomplish any task that we might require of you which, we believe, will only serve to enhance your experience.

Enjoy your stay!

__________________________________________________________________

For the AGK Space Jam July 2022

[F1] = Help/Controls

[ESC] = Main Menu

Inspired by recent unfortunate news of garbage "discovered" on Mars along with fond memories of similar gameplay found in Star Wars Galaxies MMORPG from "back in the day".

Music: Eric Matyas @ SoundImage.org
